E.Security Alarm Systems Inc. is a state licensed and insured, low voltage and security systems solutions provider in South Florida. We operate primarily in Miami-Dade, Broward and West Palm Beach counties since 2007, expanded our services. We provide unmatched security systems solutions to meet the needs of thousands of residential and commercial customers. We also provide installation and service performance for M&S Intercom systems, CCTV surveillance systems, Personal reporting system and personal self defense products along with specific self defense techniques in order to minimize or avoid a potentially threatening or deadly situation.

Our Services

Peace of mind is worth having.

That’s why we offer customized security plans to protect your home and family in all the ways that matter to you.

A secure business is a successful business.

Our monitoring technology is the best way to safeguard your valuable property and assets.
